analyzed: milindapañha
opamma kathā pañha
gad ra bha vagga

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kukkuṭassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kukkuṭassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti
yathā mahā rāja kukkuṭaḥ kālena samayena paṭisallīyati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kālena samayeneva cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ sammajjitvā
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kālena samayena iva cetiyaṅgaṇam sammajjitvā

original: pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ upaṭṭhapetvā sarīraṁ paṭijaggitvā nahāyitvā cetiyaṁ vanditvā
analyzed: pānīyam paribhojanīyam upaṭṭhapetvā sarīram paṭijaggitvā nahāyitvā cetiyam vanditvā

original: vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dassanāya gantvā kālena samayena suññāgāraṁ pavisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: vuḍḍhānam bhikkhūnam dassanāya gantvā kālena samayena suññāgāram

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kukkuṭassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo kālena samayeneva vuṭṭhāti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kukkuṭaḥ kālena samayena iva vuṭṭhāti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kālena samayeneva vuṭṭhahitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kālena samayena iva vuṭṭhahitvā

original: sammajjitvā pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ upaṭṭhapetvā sarīraṁ paṭijaggitvā cetiyaṁ vanditvā
analyzed: sammajjitvā pānīyam paribhojanīyam upaṭṭhapetvā sarīram paṭijaggitvā cetiyam vanditvā
punad eva suññāgāram pavisitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja kukkuṭassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo pathaviṁ khaṇitvā khaṇitvā ajjhohāraṁ ajjhoharati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kukkuṭaḥ pathavim khaṇitvā khaṇitvā ajjhohāram ajjhoharati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā ajjhohāraṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā ajjhohāra

original: ajjhoharitabbaṁ ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa
analyzed: ajjhoharitabbam na iva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya yāvat eva imassa

original: kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya, iti purāṇañca vedanaṁ
analyzed: kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya brahmacariya anuggahāya iti purāṇam ca vedana

original: paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṁ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
analyzed: paṭihaṅkhāmi navam ca vedanam na uppādessāmi yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajja tā ca phāsu vihāraḥ ca ati

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kukkuṭassa tatiyam aṅgam
mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena
kantāre puttamasava
yathā
evam āhari āhāra
yāpana ttham amucchitoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo sacakkhukopi rattiṁ andho hoti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja kukkuṭaḥ sa cakkhukaḥ api rattim andhaḥ hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anandheneva andhena viya bhavitabbaṁ,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena anandhena iva andhena viya

original: araññepi gocaragāme piṇḍāya carantenapi rajanīyesu rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu
analyzed: araññe pi gocara gāme piṇḍāya carantena api rajanīyesu rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba dhammesu

original: andhena badhirena mūgena viya bhavitabbaṁ, na nimittaṁ gahetabbaṁ, nānubyañjanaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: andhena badhirena mūgena viya bhavitabba na nimittam gahetabba na anubyañjanam gahetabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kukkuṭassa catuttham aṅgam
mahā rāja therena mahākaccāyanena
cakkhumā assa yathā andho
sotavā badhiraḥ yathā
paññavāssa yathā mūgaḥ
balavān dubbaloḥ iva
atta atthe samuppanne
sayetha matasāyikanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo leḍḍudaṇḍalaguḷamuggarehi paripātiyantopi sakaṁ gehaṁ na vijahati;
analyzed: puna ca para mahā rāja kukkuṭaḥ leḍḍu daṇḍa laguḷa muggarehi paripātiyantaḥ api sakam geham na vijahati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cīvarakammaṁ karontenapi navakammaṁ karontenapi
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena cīvara kammam karontena api nava kammam karontena api

original: vattappaṭivattaṁ karontenapi uddisantenapi uddisāpentenapi yoniso manasikāro na vijahitabbo,
analyzed: vattappaṭivattam karontena api uddisantena api uddisāpentena api yonisas manasikāraḥ na vijahitabbaḥ

original: sakaṁ kho panetaṁ, mahārāja, yogino gehaṁ, yadidaṁ yoniso manasikāro.
analyzed: sakam khalu pana ita mahā rāja yoginaḥ geha yat idam yonisaḥ manasikāraḥ

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja kukkuṭassa pañcamam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
analyzed: bhāsitam peta mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena kaḥ ca bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ gocaraḥ sakaḥ pettikaḥ visayaḥ
yat idam cattāraḥ sati paṭṭhānā ti
mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā api
yathā su dantaḥ mātaṅgaḥ
sakam soṇḍam na maddati
bhakkha abhakkham vijānāti
attanaḥ vutti kappana
tathā iva buddha puttena
appamattena vā pana
jina vacanam na
manasikāra varuttamanti
kukkuṭaṅgapañhaḥ dutiyaḥ
